description.value: You use the explosive momentum of shifting to help push a creature away from you. Change Shape into a larger size and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Shove]. You gain a circumstance bonus to your Athletics check to Shove equal to the number of steps between your sizes when you Change Shape (+1 if you are one size larger, +2 if you are two sizes larger, and so on).
